functions.name: parse_requirements
functions.docstring:
Parse requirements from a requirements file.

Args:
    file_path: Path to the requirements file
    
Returns:
    dict: Mapping of package names to versions and comments

functions.name: merge_requirements
functions.docstring:
Merge two sets of requirements, giving preference to base requirements.

Args:
    base_reqs: Base requirements
    additional_reqs: Additional requirements to merge
    
Returns:
    dict: Merged requirements

functions.name: write_requirements
functions.docstring:
Write merged requirements to a file.

Args:
    requirements: Dictionary of requirements
    output_file: Path to output file
